Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
Rectangle
public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
Models a simple, solid rectangle. This class represents a Rectabgle object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Rectangle class can be displayed on the screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle​(double x, double y, double w, double h, java.lang.String col)
      Constructor. Creates a Rectangle with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate position of top left corner of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      y - The y co-ordinate position of top left corner of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      w - The width of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      h - The height of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      col - The colour of the Rectangle (Permissable colours are: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARKGREY, GREY, GREEN, LIGHTGREY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW or #RRGGBB)

    • Rectangle

      public Rectangle​(double x, double y, double w, double h, java.lang.String col, int layer)
      Constructor. Creates a Rectangle with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - The x co-ordinate position of top left corner of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      y - The y co-ordinate position of top left corner of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      w - The width of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      h - The height of the Rectangle (in pixels)
      col - The colour of the Rectangle (Permissable colours are: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARKGREY, GREY, GREEN, LIGHTGREY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW or #RRGGBB)
      layer - The layer this ball is to be drawn on. Objects with a higher layer number are always drawn on top of those with lower layer numbers.

  • Method Details

    • getXPosition

      public double getXPosition()
      Obtains the current position of this Rectangle.
      Returns:
      the X coordinate of this Rectangle within the GameArena.

    • getYPosition

      public double getYPosition()
      Obtains the current position of this Rectangle.
      Returns:
      the Y coordinate of this Rectangle within the GameArena.

    • setXPosition

      public void setXPosition​(double x)
      Moves the current position of this Rectangle to the given X co-ordinate
      Parameters:
      x - the new x co-ordinate of this Rectangle

    • setYPosition

      public void setYPosition​(double y)
      Moves the current position of this Rectangle to the given Y co-ordinate
      Parameters:
      y - the new y co-ordinate of this Rectangle

    • getWidth

      public double getWidth()
      Obtains the width of this Rectangle.
      Returns:
      the width of this Rectangle,in pixels.

    • setWidth

      public void setWidth​(double w)
      Sets the width of this Rectangle to the given value
      Parameters:
      w - the new width of this Rectangle, in pixels.

      public double getHeight()
      Obtains the height of this Rectangle.

      the height of this Rectangle,in pixels.

      public int getLayer()
      Obtains the layer of this Ball.

      the layer of this Ball.

    • getColour

      public java.lang.String getColour()
      Obtains the colour of this Rectangle.
      Returns:
      a textual description of the colour of this Rectangle.

    • setColour

      public void setColour​(java.lang.String c)
      Sets the colour of this Rectangle.
      Parameters:
      c - the new colour of this Rectangle, as a String value. Permissable colours are: BLACK, BLUE, CYAN, DARKGREY, GREY, GREEN, LIGHTGREY, MAGENTA, ORANGE, PINK, RED, WHITE, YELLOW.

    • move

      public void move​(double dx, double dy)
      Moves this Rectangle by the given amount.
      Parameters:
      dx - the distance to move on the x axis (in pixels)
      dy - the distance to move on the y axis (in pixels)

    • collides

      public boolean collides​(Rectangle r)
      Determines if this Rectangle is overlapping the given rectangle.
      Parameters:
      r - the rectangle to test for collision
      Returns:
      true of this rectangle is overlapping the rectangle r, false otherwise.
